programme.title: MY WORST NEIGHBOR
programme.desc: In a house with little soundproofing, a man and a woman living next door started a noise war. They then cohabitate through the wall, and catching up in subtle emotions...

programme.title: ORDINARY PERSON
programme.desc: Sung-jin is a police officer involved in a conspiracy after he arrested a suspected murderer by chance. Gyu-nam make use of Sung-jin's weakness, his family, to strike a deal with him.

programme.title: THE ODD FAMILY: ZOMBIE ON SALE
programme.desc: When a pharmaceutical company's illegal experiments inadvertently create a zombie, the quirky Park family discovers an interesting side effect to the virus and tries to profit from it.

programme.title: THE BEAST
programme.desc: Two rival detectives compete against each other to catch the notorious killer who shakes up Korea by their gruesome murders.

programme.title: A Hundred Memories Ep7
programme.desc: Set in the 1980s, it depicts the friendship between 2 bus attendants Yeong-rye and Jong-hee, and their affectionate first love surrounding Jae-pil.

programme.title: A Hundred Memories Ep8
programme.desc: Set in the 1980s, it depicts the friendship between 2 bus attendants Yeong-rye and Jong-hee, and their affectionate first love surrounding Jae-pil.

programme.title: THE TERROR, LIVE
programme.desc: A newsman discovers he's been rigged with a bomb after he has an exclusive interview with a terrorist who blew up a bridge.

programme.title: THE ROUNDUP: PUNISHMENT
programme.desc: Ma Seok-Do investigates a drug-trafficking app, uncovers a link to an illegal organization. As Baek Chang-Gi terrorizes the gambling market, an alliance is formed to stop the threat.

programme.title: ONCE AGAIN
programme.desc: Woo-seok in his 40's has always dreamt of going back to his high school days when he had the best days of his life. After an accident, he wakes up and finds himself in the year 1997...

programme.title: THE DIVINE FURY
programme.desc: After waking up with mysterious wounds on his hands, a champion fighter finds himself in an otherworldly battle against evil forces that wreak havoc in the human world.

programme.title: BOTTOM OF THE WATER
programme.desc: Ga-young's sister died six year ago. One day, Ga-young is chased by a vengeful water spirit who appears as her sister. She strives to solve the mystery of her sister's tragic death.

programme.title: SHOOT ME IN THE HEART
programme.desc: A young man develops schizophrenia after his mother's suicide. After he meets a kindred spirit at the psychiatric hospital, he forges a plan with the man to escape.

programme.title: RETURN OF THE MAFIA
programme.desc: Ten years after welcoming Dae-suh into their family, the Three-J clan leaves their mafia past behind to establish a construction company. However, when Dae-suh becomes president, the three brothers plot against him, fearing he’ll take over.

programme.title: DEADMAN
programme.desc: An ace in the barge business makes money by selling his name, is falsely accused of embezzling billions. He fights to reclaim his stolen life from those tied to him solely by name.

programme.title: THE KING'S LETTERS
programme.desc: King Sejong desires to create an original alphabet for his people. With the help of others, they struggle to create the Korean alphabet Hangul.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: The Templetons head to a new family restaurant only to run into Bootsy Calico!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: The annual baby pageant approaches, but Staci’s plan to win may have a negative effect

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss Baby struggles to take a sick day even though a mysterious baby cry is wreaking havoc on the neighborhood baby-love

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Mom and Dad Templeton do the unthinkable: leave Boss Baby and Tim under the authority of a babysitter!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: When Mega Fat tries to get Boss Baby fired while on an airplane to Pairs, Tim and Staci must prevent a baby meltdown

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Tired of the farm's feud with the neighboring punch monkeys, Ugga arranges a punch summit where the Bettermans and Croods will stay in the punch monkey village to learn how to all get along.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Phil detects a meteor is hurtling towards the farm, the Bettermans and Croods must decide how to spend their last day on earth.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: After he’s rescued from a cave, a charismatic old lemur challenges Julien to an election for the throne.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: King Julien believes Mort is the son he never knew he had – despite the fact that Mort is two years older than him.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: During an attempt to get displaced Fire Gronckles back to their native Fire Realm, D’Angelo makes a mistake by accidentally feeding them Catastrophic Quaken eggs.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Eugene discovers the Lair and demands a dragon of his own.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: The whole gang escapes pursing Guards, battles flowing lava, and survives crumbling caves and pillars to finally make it back to the Forbidden City. Xiao is ready to escape the palace, but Shi Long has other plans for her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: The gang learns of even bigger and direr forces working against the Empress and the Kingdom of China, and must come up with a plan to put a stop to it before it is too late.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: When Puss feels powerless against the threat of the Bloodwolf, the crew asks Callista to help find the mysterious location of the Obelisk of Night

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: When Puss and Dulcinea tracked down the Grotto of Riches, they each have their own plan on how to convince Mary and her flock to help find the Obelisk

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: It’s Chinese New Year! With Yi and Jin tied up in their respective CNY festival performances, Peng and a semi-disguised Everest hit the festive streets, eating and enjoying everything in sight. Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi realizes that Peng and Everest were taken by Nian, the legendary dragon-like creature associated with Chinese New Year – and he’s also taken their other creature friends! With Burnish and Duchess’ help, Yi and Jin travel outside of the city to find Nian’s cave. But a skirmish in the cave drives the conflict with Nian back to the city, wreacking havoc on the festival. The crew and creatures band together to try to stop Nian, but they’re no match. Will Yi be able to create magic and connect with the troubled creature without Everest’s magic strings on her violin?

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: The dollhouse is immersed in imaginative Wild West play with Sheriff Gabby, Sheriff Pandy, and CatRat the Bandit. Sheriff Gabby and Sheriff Pandy must safely deliver gold to the bank, but it gets confiscated by Bandit CatRat! They go on an adventure to get the gold back and restore order in the dollhouse.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: Gabby brings DJ Catnip a microphone for him to use in the big music show, but he has some terrible news: he lost his groove! Determined to help him get his groove back, Gabby and Pandy take him on a musical search through the dollhouse. As they go, Gabby uses the microphone to record sounds from the Gabby Cats’ everyday activities that culminate into a new song that gets DJ his groove back just in time for the show! In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Gabby sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a recipe for dandelion soup and a soup bowl, she discovers Kitty Fairy is sick! Gabby and Pandy make her some delicious dandelion soup and while she rests, they take care of her Garden. With the help of all the Gabby Cats, they water the Singing Flowers, help the Rainbow Kitty Bushes regain their color, and sing some fussy Itty Bitty Blossoms a lullaby. For our Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song!

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: The Crood and Betterman parents have been struggling to get along – they’re so different! The two couple realize they need some time apart and decide to get away from the farm and each other. Too bad both couples choose to take a break on the same, small beach.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: While the parents are away, the kids are in charge of the tree house, but when the punch monkeys invade the house, the kids find themselves out of their element.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Jealous of the Thunder Sisters, the men on the farm undergo a series of difficult initiation rituals to try and join the exclusive tribe of women.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: It’s Chinese New Year! With Yi and Jin tied up in their respective CNY festival performances, Peng and a semi-disguised Everest hit the festive streets, eating and enjoying everything in sight. Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi realizes that Peng and Everest were taken by Nian, the legendary dragon-like creature associated with Chinese New Year – and he’s also taken their other creature friends! With Burnish and Duchess’ help, Yi and Jin travel outside of the city to find Nian’s cave. But a skirmish in the cave drives the conflict with Nian back to the city, wreacking havoc on the festival. The crew and creatures band together to try to stop Nian, but they’re no match. Will Yi be able to create magic and connect with the troubled creature without Everest’s magic strings on her violin?

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: The dollhouse is immersed in imaginative Wild West play with Sheriff Gabby, Sheriff Pandy, and CatRat the Bandit. Sheriff Gabby and Sheriff Pandy must safely deliver gold to the bank, but it gets confiscated by Bandit CatRat! They go on an adventure to get the gold back and restore order in the dollhouse.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: Gabby brings DJ Catnip a microphone for him to use in the big music show, but he has some terrible news: he lost his groove! Determined to help him get his groove back, Gabby and Pandy take him on a musical search through the dollhouse. As they go, Gabby uses the microphone to record sounds from the Gabby Cats’ everyday activities that culminate into a new song that gets DJ his groove back just in time for the show! In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Gabby sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a recipe for dandelion soup and a soup bowl, she discovers Kitty Fairy is sick! Gabby and Pandy make her some delicious dandelion soup and while she rests, they take care of her Garden. With the help of all the Gabby Cats, they water the Singing Flowers, help the Rainbow Kitty Bushes regain their color, and sing some fussy Itty Bitty Blossoms a lullaby. For our Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song!

programme.title: Problem Child in House
programme.desc: A collection of outrageous problems that you have never heard of! A great 'knowledge talk show' where problematic children who are struggling and fighting in the emotional rooftop room gain true wisdom about life and the world.

programme.title: Marie and Her Three Daddies
programme.desc: Marie's turbulent journey to find her father leads to the birth of an eccentric new family, one that proves stronger than blood and more persistent than DNA.

programme.title: A Graceful Liar
programme.desc: A bold yet heartbreaking story of a mother and daughter-in-law who meet through marriage and wage a war of lies to seize the Geonhyang family, struggling for a dramatic reversal of fortune.

programme.title: Queen's House
programme.desc: A revenge story about a woman in the top 1% starting over from the ground up to reclaim her stolen life and find her true 'home'. A passionate drama of people striving to regain the true meaning of life.

programme.title: Our Golden Days
programme.desc: Everyone has their golden days. Whether now, in the past, or the future. A heartfelt family melodrama that resonates across generations, exploring those dazzling days we all encounter with different meanings.

programme.title: The Best of Immortal Songs
programme.desc: The true classic of the century is born again! The legendary classic is reinterpreted by the best vocalists in Korea. Don't miss out on the heart-moving moments that transcend generations.

programme.title: K-Pop World Festival in Changwon 2025
programme.desc: KBS Changwon K-POP WORLD FESTIVAL is the world's largest Korean Wave festival with global K-POP fans from all over the world.

programme.title: Uncontrollably Fond
programme.desc: It's a love story of a man and woman who meet again after they broke up in the past. The man, in the presence of his death, wishes to make amends. Their romance will have you seek comfort and hope in love.

programme.title: My Neighbor, Charles
programme.desc: Foreigners who have left their familiar worlds behind and come to the unfamiliar land of Korea! A vivid, real-life adaptation story of foreigners trying to settle into Korean society for various reasons. This reality program warmly portrays their concerns about jobs, marriage, and parenting while living in Korea.

programme.title: Dogs Are Incredible 2
programme.desc: The training academy from Dogs Are Incredible! For pet owners struggling with issues like biting, aggression, or excessive barking from their beloved dogs who've become part of the family. Experts from various fields provide customized training methods and tailored advice — helping unruly dogs transform into well-behaved companions!

programme.title: Got The Spot
programme.desc: This program highlights locations that are truly exceptional, blending traditional elements with modern trends. Through the eyes of foreign influencers who thrive on social media, we aim to showcase the unique charm of different regions and generate a wealth of engaging content in this groundbreaking travel initiative!

programme.title: Boss in the Mirror
programme.desc: Korean celebrity-bosses go through self-examinations to create truly fulfilling workplaces.

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Join Indonesian famous models Patricia and Chika as they explore the city's hidden gems and vibrant scenes, immersing themselves in amazing contrasts and trendy vibes.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: The Fight Machine
programme.desc: Two young Canadians from starkly different worlds are each trapped in a life beyond his control. When they are pulled into the unforgiving underground bare knuckle fight circuit, their collision sparks a brutal journey of vengeance, retribution and self discovery.

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Kowloon Walled City
programme.desc: Neng was a street fighter in Northeast China but decides to start a new life in Hong Kong’s Kowloon Walled City. Unfortunately, he is implicated in the fights and conspiracies among the triad forces. When his good friend is hunted down by the triad, Neng must team up with the residents of Kowloon Walled City to fight back and save his friend.

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his family’s massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: Night Walk
programme.desc: Frank is framed for murder after his girlfriend is killed in a tragic incident during their visit to the Middle East. He is sent to a prison where he meets a Muslim inmate who helps him plan for a prison escape to prove his innocence. When his friend suddenly dies, can Frank successfully escape and seek justice for himself?

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Embark on the journey with two Thai artistes, Gun and Ticha, as they navigate the bustling city life and discover the serene outskirts of Hong Kong.

The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Love Punch
programme.desc: Talented boxer Jia Yang is caught in an underground fight to clear her father's debts. She loses her Olympic aspiration and vanishes from the boxing world. 10 years later, Coach Li Yue is determined to help her honour her father's wish by returning to the ring. As passion and obligation collide, can Jia Yang revive her abandoned boxing dream?

programme.title: Oceanfront Property Hunt
programme.desc: Chrissie and Jamie have an active outdoor lifestyle. They want a home where they can just wake up and jump in the water for a swim, and the home must be a place their three adult sons will want to visit.

programme.title: Best In Chow
programme.desc: Host Matt Richards goes to the Mission District in San Francisco to find the best wild card, sweet, and savoury dishes.

programme.title: Buddy Valastro's Cake Dynasty
programme.desc: When Buddy is tasked with making a cake for International Country Superstar Walker Hayes, the team must find a way to transform the lyrics to his hit song "Fancy Like" into a sweet masterpiece!

programme.title: Taken In Montana
programme.desc: When her parents go missing on their family vacation, teen Regan must put the clues together to find them - but she may be trusting the wrong people to help, putting herself in danger.

programme.title: Crowdsource Murder
programme.desc: Monica starts a crowdsource fund to pay for the hospital bills after her daughter is injured. But as a seemingly attractive and generous man donates more and more money, she begins to question his motives.

programme.title: Earth Sweepers
programme.desc: The Earth-Cleaning Bros’ second mission: planting trees in the Elsen Tasarkhai desert! Led by self-proclaimed Mongolian expert Shaun, they set out with just one GPS coordinate.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S5)
programme.desc: Derek gets a new property for $.50 on the dollar, which makes him confident that nothing could possibly go wrong. But when they face the worst rat and roach infestation, their hopes quickly turn to fears.

programme.title: All Fixed Up In An Empty Village (S3)
programme.desc: In the early hours, the four-member team races from Seoul to Jeonju. From design and interior renovations to store menu development, everything is in their hands!

programme.title: Best In Chow
programme.desc: Little Italy in San Diego used to be an Italian food hub. Now it's one of the go-to spots for everything from brunch food to late night gourmet. Matt stokes three rounds of competition on his quest.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S3)
programme.desc: Arroz con pollo, or chicken and rice, is a traditional Latin American dish loved by millions worldwide. Rachael shows you how to make it quickly and easily so that it becomes a household staple.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S3)
programme.desc: Rachael prepares a family-friendly, go-to meal of sautéed chicken thighs marinated with chilli crisp, cooked with mango salsa and served with steamed vegetables.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S3)
programme.desc: Inspired by international film star and cookbook author Sophia Loren's recipe for eggplant (aubergine) parmigiana, Rachael makes the dish in the proper Italian style, with aged Parmigiano Reggiano cheese.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S3)
programme.desc: To celebrate her wedding anniversary, Rachael prepares her famous beet risotto, made with roasted beetroot, red wine, onions, ricotta salata and more.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S3)
programme.desc: Rachael prepares a classic pesto sauce using fresh basil, roasted pistachios and pine nuts, combined with pecorino and parmesan cheeses. She then cooks it "Lucca Style", with potatoes and green beans.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper: Breaking Out
programme.desc: Dottie the body lost her confidence when a bump started growing between her thighs. Dr. Lee brings in a new, young doctor to help Tim with his big, bumpy nose. Karime is insecure about her birthmark.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper: Breaking Out
programme.desc: Katrina has oozing, smelly boils that have taken over her life. Kim's head-to-toe tumours interfere with her sleep apnea mask, resulting in constant exhaustion.

programme.title: Trapped In The Farmhouse
programme.desc: A woman on the run from her abusive boyfriend seeks shelter from a terrifying storm in an isolated farmhouse, unaware that something far worse is waiting for her inside.

programme.title: The Podcast Murders
programme.desc: A true crime podcaster tries to keep a low profile despite achieving success for her investigation of the case she calls the "Barbie Murders." But soon her anonymity isn't the only thing being threatened.

programme.title: Crowdsource Murder
programme.desc: Monica starts a crowdsource fund to pay for the hospital bills after her daughter is injured. But as a seemingly attractive and generous man donates more and more money, she begins to question his motives.

programme.title: Secrets In The Desert
programme.desc: A romantic road trip turns into a woman's desperate search for answers when the car she and her boyfriend are driving breaks down in a creepy backwater town. Then the boyfriend vanishes.

programme.desc: While in London, Theresa visits a hatmaker to dress for high tea, and is surprised when the hatmaker turns down a reading. At tea, Theresa conducts an emotional group reading.

programme.title: Theresa Caputo: Raising Spirits (S1)
programme.desc: The Caputos are briefly all under the same roof for the first time in weeks. Theresa visits her cousins in Rehoboth Beach for an impromptu vacation in between tour stops.

programme.title: Oceanfront Property Hunt
programme.desc: Sean moved to the East Coast to be with Candace, but living in her bachelorette apartment is becoming cramped. They are searching for a seaside home that accommodates both of their needs.

programme.title: Oceanfront Property Hunt
programme.desc: Tania and Sundara moved to the East Coast for work and are now looking to find a permanent place to live and expand their family. They want a peaceful place near the ocean to relax and enjoy each other.

programme.title: CSI S5 E06 - Formalities
programme.desc: Some provocative episodes from Season 5 of CSI involve Russian mail order brides ("Nesting Dolls"), infantism ("King Baby"), and the Mexican lifestyle of narcocorrido ("Snakes"). From the creative storytelling ("4x4") to the macabre ("Who Shot Sherlock?"), there’s something in Season 5 for everyone. The CSI team investigates many crimes that hit close to home as well. Grissom comes under fire from Ecklie ("Mea Culpa"), Brass tracks down his estranged daughter ("Hollywood Brass"), and during the course of the season Greg Sanders completes his transition from the lab to the field. Last, but not least, Season 5 wraps with an amazing two-part episode ("Grave Danger"), written and directed by Quentin Tarantino, where Nick comes face to face with death while the team exhausts all its resources to same him.

programme.title: Lucas Abelardo
programme.desc: His sincerity and great dedication to his work is what distinguished police officer Lucas Abelardo from his other colleagues. But keeping to his principles while doing his job is not easy.

programme.title: Hatulan: Bilibid Boys 2
programme.desc: Bilibid Boys are young and daring but lost in a cruel society.

programme.title: Pacifico Guevarra, Dillinger Ng Dos Pares
programme.desc: Young action star Raymart Santiago played one of his most demanding roles as Pacifico Guevarra who called himself Dillinger after the American gangster whom he idolized.

programme.title: Pita, Terror Ng Kalookan
programme.desc: Pita witnessed the murder of his favorite brother and vowed to take revenge. He did, and was jailed for his vendetta.

programme.title: Strict Ang Peyrents Ko
programme.desc: Lynette was a beautiful young woman, whose parents, Marimar and Fulgoso, were unreasonably strict with her. They refused to allow her to meet men and those who venture to court her were instantly turned away.

programme.title: Dahil Tanging Ikaw
programme.desc: Erika and Cecil are twins who were separated by poverty right after they were born. Each of them was caught up in her own existence, not knowing that somewhere not so far lived a twin. But one day, fate found a clever way to bring them back together.

programme.title: Kung Mahawi Man Ang Ulap (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The happy life of Hilda and her widowed mother, Gloria, changed for the worse when Eddie and his family moved in as their tenants. In no time at all, Gloria had gotten married to Eddie and was providing for his entire family. Still, she lived for the day when she would be able to reclaim what's rightfully hers.

programme.title: Epimaco Velasco Story, NBI
programme.desc: FPJ took on the role of the country's modern day hero, Epimaco Velasco. Presented here were some of the best known among the many celebrated cases he solved and his private life as a devoted family man.

programme.title: Ulo Ng Gang-Ho
programme.desc: The life story of Viyong, a notorious police from Balic-Balic, Samaloc.

programme.title: The Secret of Katrina Salazar
programme.desc: Her name is Katrina Salazar, a beautiful woman admired by men but sincerely loved by just one. But behind the lovely face and the pleasant countenance is a dark secret no one knows: she is a nymphomaniac.

programme.title: Hindi Mo Ako Kayang Tapakan
programme.desc: This is the story of Tacing--a woman involved in different love affairs, which resulted in endless trials and tribulations. Nardo, Tom, Ramon and Angelito, were just some of the many men who became part of Tacing's life and played parts in making her accept the reality of womanhood.

programme.desc: Bagwis Ng Lawin

programme.title: Muling Buksan Ang Puso (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Too much love suffocates and covetousness can breed hate.

programme.title: Seeds of Peace
programme.desc: The Hiroshima and Nagasaki Peace Messengers visit the United Nations in Geneva each year. We join them as they call for nuclear abolition and see the complexities of global politics in a new light.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Karl and Tina:2024 Winter & Spring
programme.desc: Amid the deep winter snow, a US high school student comes to stay at a house restored by Karl. When spring finally arrives, the villagers celebrate the cherry blossoms and enjoy seasonal dishes.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Train Cruise
programme.desc: Journey through the snowy landscapes of northern Fukui Prefecture in central Japan on the Echizen Railway. Practice zazen meditation at Eiheiji, sip locally brewed sake, and dine on Echizen crab.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Japanese paper, known as washi, is attractively textured and extremely durable. In a 5-minute digest, we explore its role in modern society and examine how it represents Japanese aesthetics.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Design X Stories
programme.desc: Today's theme: Design Hunting in Tottori. On the Sea of Japan coast, the Tottori Sand Dunes create unique, everchanging views. Our design hunt explores a culture with deep roots in the natural world.

programme.title: Let's Enjoy MATH
programme.desc: Numbler hides the measuring stick at a shoe shop so that a customer's foot cannot be measured. Barky realizes that the measurement can be made by counting how many 1-centimeter items are needed.

programme.title: TAKE TECH
programme.desc: A program for upper primary to lower secondary school children to explore the everyday technologies all around them. Each episode takes a piece of familiar tech to find out what it does and how.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: SAMURAI CASTLES: Aizuwakamatsu
programme.desc: This castle, 200km north of Tokyo, was a battleground in Japan's last civil war in the mid-19th C. Modern warfare did not bring it down. We look at the secrets to the its strengths and its lords.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history and culture. This episode looks at words related to theater. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: In Saidaiji Eyo, thousands of near-naked men endure icy water and the winter cold as they are purified at a temple. Some of the normal rites are being reintroduced as the pandemic recedes.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Reiho: Respect in Practice
programme.desc: For 800 years, the Ogasawara family has taught Japanese etiquette through daily actions. We learn how this cultivates self-awareness and understanding of others.

programme.title: Gateway to the Land of the Death
programme.desc: Shugendo, a unique spiritual tradition, dates back 1,300 years. Through beautiful time-lapse footage, we show its practitioners and Kumano's sacred forests, long associated with death and rebirth.

programme.title: BOSAI
programme.desc: Explore how Japan uses artificial satellites and surface observation to quickly assess flood and earthquake damage, supporting disaster preparedness.

programme.title: Icy Landscapes
programme.desc: Tsukamoto Yoshiharu (Architect) visits Nara. Long ago, people in Nara preserved ice by building an icehouse on a mountain ridge, showing how architecture can make use of natural characteristics.

programme.title: The Observers
programme.desc: The Observers on France 24 is a weekly show produced with photos, videos and personal accounts from Observers around the world. Top international current affairs are covered by using eyewitness accounts from Observers- people who are at the heart of an event. They send their photos and videos, which are verified and contextualized by France 24 team of professional journalists in Paris. The Observers are volunteers, and are not paid for their contributions.

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: Keep up with the latest news from all over the globe with Focus on France 24. Focus programme provides exclusive reports from Monday to Friday at 7.50 am Paris time. Find out what's going on in the world of economy, politics, culture, sport, medicine, ecology. Focus has it all covered for you. Short videos contain facts, interviews with real people, numbers, statistics, everything you need to be aware of recent events in the world and of what is actually going on.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Have the time of your life with Meryl Streep and an all-star cast in this undeniably fun celebration of mothers and daughters, old friends and newly found family!

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Homicide detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of serial killer Edgar Reese. Soon after the execution, the killings start again, and they are very similar to Reese's style.

programme.title: Megamind
programme.desc: Super villain Megamind’s (Will Ferrell) dreams have come true when he conquers Metro Man (Brad Pitt) but when a new villain (Jonah Hill) runs rampant, can Megamind save the day?

programme.title: Apollo 13
programme.desc: Apollo 13 is an inspiring and riveting story of the real-life space flight that gripped a nation and changed the world.

programme.title: Just My Luck
programme.desc: Sexy Manhattanite Ashley is known as the luckiest woman around, but after a chance romantic encounter with down-and-out Jake, she realizes that she's swapped her fortune for his.

programme.title: Norbit
programme.desc: Murphy stars as mild mannered Norbit, who gets a second chance at love with his childhood sweetheart, Kate. However, obstacles may make this romance slightly more difficult than expected.

programme.title: Road House (1989)
programme.desc: A legendary bouncer comes to restore order at a notorious bar but runs afoul of a ruthless crime boss who controls the town.

programme.title: The Terminator
programme.desc: A cyborg is sent from the future to assassinate a young woman who's destined to give birth to a son who will become the key to saving humanity.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Jack Black and Robert Downey Jr. lead an ensemble cast in 'Tropic Thunder,' an action comedy about a group of self-absorbed actors who set out to make the most expensive war film.

programme.title: Stop! Or My Mom Will Shoot
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone and Estelle Getty star in this action comedy about a detective whose life is turned upside down when his feisty mother witnesses a murder and becomes his unlikely partner.

programme.title: Man on Fire
programme.desc: In Mexico City, a former Marine swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

programme.title: Jacqueline Comes Home: The Chiong Story
programme.desc: Based on a true crime that happened in 1997, the story is about an unknown assailant kidnapping two sisters, Jacqueline and Marijoy Chiong. This is one of the most shocking cases of rape and murder in Philippines history.

programme.title: Fate Jealous Greed
programme.desc: The film consists of three short horror stories: a man tries to survive after he received a haunted mail predicting his death; while a man mourns the death of his beloved wife, she becomes a ghost and tries to communicate with him; three brothers clash over the care options of their elderly mother during dinner, leading to a terrifying murder.

programme.title: The Ice Cream Truck
programme.desc: Mary moves back to her suburban hometown as her husband is relocated there for work. While waiting for her husband in their new house, Mary becomes the target of an evil slasher that stalks the suburbs in an ice-cream truck. She soon learns that the suburbs are not what they seem...

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Si Nan and her husband travel to Kuala Lumpur for a vacation to relieve her pregnancy stress. However, she soon uncovers his evil plan to turn their child into a 'Luk Krok' for profit, which puts her in grave danger. With the help of the hotel ghosts, she manages to flee and alert the police to arrest him, finally giving birth to her child.

programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted
programme.desc: Eight members of the Japanese idol group AKB48 gather at a temple to talk about their most mysterious and terrifying stories. As the group sits in a circle, each member shares a ghost story, urban legend, or paranormal activity found in Japanese folklore. They each holds a lit lantern, and as each story concludes, a lantern extinguishes…

programme.title: Jacqueline Comes Home: The Chiong Story
programme.desc: Based on a true crime that happened in 1997, the story is about an unknown assailant kidnapping two sisters, Jacqueline and Marijoy Chiong. This is one of the most shocking cases of rape and murder in Philippines history.

programme.title: Fate Jealous Greed
programme.desc: The film consists of three short horror stories: a man tries to survive after he received a haunted mail predicting his death; while a man mourns the death of his beloved wife, she becomes a ghost and tries to communicate with him; three brothers clash over the care options of their elderly mother during dinner, leading to a terrifying murder.

programme.title: The Ice Cream Truck
programme.desc: Mary moves back to her suburban hometown as her husband is relocated there for work. While waiting for her husband in their new house, Mary becomes the target of an evil slasher that stalks the suburbs in an ice-cream truck. She soon learns that the suburbs are not what they seem...

programme.title: Night at the Eagle Inn
programme.desc: A pair of fraternal twins spend a terrifying night in a remote inn to investigate the last known whereabouts of their father who mysteriously disappeared the night they were born. As they dive deeper, the property's dark secrets ensnare them in a hellish labyrinth which they must escape before dawn.

programme.title: The Fox Demon Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a story in the novel “Strange Tales from Liaozhai”, a young student in the late Ming Dynasty meets a charming fox demon and they soon fall in love. Though they encounter several obstacles due to their different nature, the lovers continue to fight against fate. Can they finally be together?

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: Zombie Island
programme.desc: Jeff, a big fan of zombies, goes to a deserted and mysterious island with his friends hoping to seek out exciting adventures. What started as an adventure turns out to be a horrifying journey as they get trapped on the island and are attacked by the zombies! Their lives are in danger when they fail to fight back, and the game has only just begun!

programme.title: Creepy Pasta
programme.desc: Trapped in an abandoned house, a young man desperately searches for clues about his trapped situation. The unsettling truth actually lies in a sequence of viral videos and they gradually corrupt his mind…

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Jing Wen, a struggling drama student, takes on a modelling job to help cover her tuition costs. As she becomes a model for an enigmatic artist specializing in expressive human body sketches, Jing Wen accidentally uncovers a shocking truth, plunging her into a desperate fight for survival.

programme.title: Night at the Eagle Inn
programme.desc: A pair of fraternal twins spend a terrifying night in a remote inn to investigate the last known whereabouts of their father who mysteriously disappeared the night they were born. As they dive deeper, the property's dark secrets ensnare them in a hellish labyrinth which they must escape before dawn.

programme.title: The Fox Demon Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a story in the novel “Strange Tales from Liaozhai”, a young student in the late Ming Dynasty meets a charming fox demon and they soon fall in love. Though they encounter several obstacles due to their different nature, the lovers continue to fight against fate. Can they finally be together?

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: When Lia was ten, she became intrigued by her mother's many collectibles and started going to antique stores and estate sales with her and is where Lia suspects her hoarding compulsion originates.

programme.title: Murder At The Motel
programme.desc: November 23, 2014, Springfield, Oregon. A housekeeper at the Village Inn Motel calls police when she finds a guest unresponsive and cold to the touch.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Murder In The Bayou
programme.desc: When the body of free-spirited Bonnie Ruphard, 47, is spotted by a runner in Lafayette, LA, police suspect domestic violence.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: When Toni meets Harold at a medical convention, they click and soon marry. But when money starts going missing from Toni's account, suspicion falls on Harold.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S3)
programme.desc: During a road rage incident, Theodore Edgecomb shoots and kills immigration lawyer Jason Cleereman. Charging him with 1st-degree intentional homicide, the state contends it was a cold-blooded murder.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: Residents of Robeson, Pennsylvania were stunned when Ashley Kline went missing on New Year's Eve. The 12-day search turned up several suspects until investigators uncovered suspicious text messages.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: Detectives interrogate a woman accused of killing a lottery winner for his $30,000,000 prize; special agents press an ex-con about a missing 5-year-old girl and her dead babysitter; and more.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A 92-year-old woman tells investigators why she shot and killed her 72-year-old son; a detective tells a suspect that the man he’s accused of stabbing has died at the hospital; and more.

programme.title: Evil Up Close (S6)
programme.desc: Chef Philip Rolph was besotted with waitress Georgina Henshaw. But Phil realised she was using him for his money, and Georgina bragged to a friend that she was planning to kill him.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: Before he hunted down his first victim in the wilds of Alaska, Robert Hansen was working at his father's bakery in a small town in Iowa, slowly developing an animosity towards women.

programme.title: Murder In The 21st
programme.desc: When a 19-year-old struggling to make it on her own goes missing, her family kicks into high gear to find her.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S1)
programme.desc: A man finds himself in jail over stolen blueberries, and a woman who has spent her life running from the law decides to surrender in hopes of making amends with her son.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: Aileen Wuornos is a woman fleeing a troubled past and yearning for a connection. Instead of finding love, she develops a simmering rage in her heart that finally explodes.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: The husband and father of a murdered family attacks their killer in court; a judge has no patience for a foul-mouthed defendant; a convicted drunk driver begs the judge for mercy; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: The stepfather of a murder victim causes chaos in the court; a defendant throws a temper tantrum during a virtual hearing; a victim's parents confront the parents of a teacher.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: When a Tulsa man is killed by a bullet to the head, detectives discover guns hidden in the garage next door. The neighbor's role becomes a question in a case of cousin against cousin.

programme.title: City Confidential (S9)
programme.desc: Folks in Anchorage, Alaska, are shaken to their core when a popular barista goes missing from the town's favourite coffee shop.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S3)
programme.desc: Skiing icon Dean Cummings is on trial for the shooting death of Guillermo Arriola, a local New Mexican rancher who was only armed with a can of mace.

programme.title: The First 48 (S26)
programme.desc: An altercation in a casino parking lot leads to murder when friends abandon reason for revenge.

programme.title: Homicide Squad New Orleans (S1)
programme.desc: Early on Sunday morning, Detective Tanisha Sykes Smith responds to a man found deceased from multiple gunshot wounds alongside a building in the Lower 9th Ward.

programme.title: Bestioles En Questions
programme.desc: As a nature enthusiast, Émilie is very interested in the behaviour of insects and other small creatures. What do ants eat? Why are frogs slimy? Can a tortoise catch a cold? No question goes unasked!

programme.title: Les Métiers
programme.desc: To gain a better understanding of some professions, school children explain jobs to their parents in their own words.

programme.title: Kenda
programme.desc: Thanks to the help and support of her friends, Kenda tackles all those little everyday problems with optimism. The children's adventures also offer them an opportunity to understand the importance of human values and the world that surrounds them.

programme.title: Les 3 Mousquetaires
programme.desc: Charlotte, Olivia, Inès and Isa lead a double life: ordinary girls at court, training in secret to be the best fighters in the kingdom. The 3 Musketeers, that's them! Bound by an unbreakable friendship, they foil plots and protect the king from his enemies.

programme.title: Les 3 Mousquetaires
programme.desc: Charlotte, Olivia, Inès and Isa lead a double life: ordinary girls at court, training in secret to be the best fighters in the kingdom. The 3 Musketeers, that's them! Bound by an unbreakable friendship, they foil plots and protect the king from his enemies.

programme.title: Les Triplés
programme.desc: The triplets may look like angels, but they're not the last to get up to mischief... The two brothers and the sister are inseparable and as loving as they are mischievous. The adults need to be brave to channel their energy!

programme.title: Le Refuge D'Audrey
programme.desc: What do the hairy-nosed wombat, the k?k?p? and the saiga antelope have in common? They are all amongst the rarest animals on Earth. Audrey, age 7, shares her everyday life with them at a wildlife shelter that works to protect species threatened with extinction.

programme.title: Comme Des Têtes Pas De Poule
programme.desc: To charm Anaïs who says that he isn't manly enough, Lounis tries to look macho. Vic is in the middle of confidences made to her by Marie and Maya.

programme.title: Kassa Le Messager
programme.desc: At his grandfather's request, Kassa heads off on a mission to discover the culture and history of thirteen African countries.

programme.title: Version Française
programme.desc: In the heart of Brittany, visit the Pont-Aven museum. Interior design and a passion for cinema come together in Sandra Benhamou's world. Lacoste reinvents itself under the leadership of Pelagia Kolotouros. Patient and meticulous, restorer Marie-Cécile Kfouri brings frescoes and old canvases back to life.

programme.title: Magazine
programme.desc: Magazine

programme.title: Objectif Monde L'Hebdo
programme.desc: May 28, 2025. A mountain landslide buries Blatten in Upper Valais: a major event of the year in Switzerland. Very quickly, the authorities say they want to rebuild the small village in the Lötschental before 2029; parliamentarians question this ambition. What future for Blatten? Are other villages at risk?

programme.title: Ding Dong : Montre-Moi Ta Maison !

programme.title: Clean Sweep 1: Done Is Done
programme.desc: Shelly Mohan, a housewife and mother of three, makes an irreparable decision and commits a horrific act when Charlie Lynch, a man from her troubled past, contacts her.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 2: Post Mortem
programme.desc: Shelly's husband Jason, a Garda Detective, is delighted to be assigned to the case, with no sense where the trail may lead. While he and his co-worker, Fiona, focus on a sex worker, Shelly realizes she may have left evidence in the dead man's hotel room.

programme.title: The Little Comrade
programme.desc: During Stalinist tyranny, 6-year-old Leelo’s mother is sent to a prison camp. Haunted by her mother’s last words telling her to be a good kid, Leelo vows to be on her best behaviour in the hope that it will bring her mother back.

programme.title: Irreplaceable
programme.desc: Jean-Pierre Werner, a revered and devoted country doctor, discovers that he is suffering from an inoperable tumor. As a doctor from the city arrives to help him with his practice, Werner is troubled by the thought that he is no longer irreplaceable.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Deadly Desire
programme.desc: When an Istanbul real estate manager is burned alive in his car, Inspector Mehmet Özakin has to dig into a maze of corruption and fraud to try and piece together the deadly puzzle - and almost becomes a victim himself.

programme.title: Three Times Nothing
programme.desc: When three homeless friends win the lottery, they assume their lives are going to change drastically for the better. But claiming the money turns out to be more of a problem than a solution.

programme.title: Domingo (2021)
programme.desc: After his divorce, 55-year-old Domingo embarks on a belated journey to fulfil his lifelong dream – to become a sports commentator. Though he aspires to join the local TV station, his commentaries are unknowingly leaving an impact on his community.

programme.title: The Beautiful Spark
programme.desc: After losing his job in a scandal, Michelin-starred chef Philippe gets a second chance at La Belle Étincelle - a unique restaurant run by Virginie, and staffed by her autistic son Noé alongside other young people with disabilities.

programme.title: Suro
programme.desc: A young, vulnerable couple inherits a cork-harvesting farm in rural Catalonia. As newly fledged landowners, they dream of building a fair and sustainable life, only to find their ideals clash head-on with their dire need to make money.

programme.title: Lilly's Disappearance (1)
programme.desc: A family vacation turns into a nightmare when 5-year-old Lilly disappears without a trace. As her frantic parents desperately search for her, friends become suspects. Could her parents themselves also be hiding something?

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Thailand (1)
programme.desc: A prisoner transfer to Thailand goes horribly wrong for Detectives Mehmet and Mustafa when the pair are kidnapped by a local crime family and Mehmet is forced to break their boss out of prison to save Mustafa’s life.

programme.title: A Far Shore (OTO)
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Aoi is an underage mother struggling to make ends meet and dealing with her husband’s violent temper. After her husband loses his job, their continuous fights lead them to a social downfall.

programme.title: Behind the Mountains
programme.desc: After spending four years in jail for vandalizing his place of work, Rafik has only one plan, take his son to the mountains and show him his amazing discovery.

programme.title: The Key Witness
programme.desc: BKA bodyguard Jan Schäfer must protect Fiona Weibel, a key witness for the International Tribunal of the Law of the Sea. With Weiber having insider knowledge of a Swiss shipping company's illicit activities, a game of cat and mouse over her life begins.

programme.title: Deal At The Border
programme.desc: Aza and Samat, two drug runners navigating the secret routes in the mountains of Central Asia, stumble upon Nazik, a young girl fleeing from slavery. When Nazik is recaptured by a criminal, facing a grim return to captivity, Aza resolves to save her.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 3: Find Her
programme.desc: As Shelly attempts to maintain her routine, she is haunted by her past. When Lynch's true identity is discovered, a UK cold case officer re-opens a case which she is convinced involves Lynch and his then girlfriend.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 4: Deirdre
programme.desc: Shelly's attempts to bond with Derek are not a success. Meanwhile, following the lead of the hotel sex-worker, Jason and Fiona discover victims of a brutal trafficking organisation.

programme.title: Glastonbury 2024 - EP 4
programme.desc: Chris Martin’s band make musical history by headlining at the Pyramid Stage a record-breaking five times. Grammy award-winning singer Dua Lipa also graces the Pyramid Stage seven years after her festival debut while country-pop crossover singer Shania Twain follows in the footsteps of Diana Ross, Dolly Parton and Kylie Minogue by taking the coveted Sunday afternoon legend’ slot.

programme.title: The Age of Adaline

programme.title: Suro
programme.desc: A young, vulnerable couple inherits a cork-harvesting farm in rural Catalonia. As newly fledged landowners, they dream of building a fair and sustainable life, only to find their ideals clash head-on with their dire need to make money.

programme.title: Domingo (2021)
programme.desc: After his divorce, 55-year-old Domingo embarks on a belated journey to fulfil his lifelong dream – to become a sports commentator. Though he aspires to join the local TV station, his commentaries are unknowingly leaving an impact on his community.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Thailand (1)
programme.desc: A prisoner transfer to Thailand goes horribly wrong for Detectives Mehmet and Mustafa when the pair are kidnapped by a local crime family and Mehmet is forced to break their boss out of prison to save Mustafa’s life.

programme.title: Behind the Mountains
programme.desc: After spending four years in jail for vandalizing his place of work, Rafik has only one plan, take his son to the mountains and show him his amazing discovery.

programme.title: Playmaker
programme.desc: A former footballer and jailbird, Ivo is no longer interested in football. That is until he meets Lukas, a talented young player, and decides to help him pursue a professional career. But his criminal past soon catches up with him.

programme.title: A Far Shore
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Aoi is an underage mother struggling to make ends meet and dealing with her husband’s violent temper. After her husband loses his job, their continuous fights lead them to a social downfall.

programme.title: Victim
programme.desc: Ukrainian immigrant Irina lives with her son Igor in a small Czech border town. When she discovers that Igor has been assaulted by three Romas her whole world comes crashing down. As times goes on, Irina begins to spot inconsistencies in his story.

programme.title: The Key Witness
programme.desc: BKA bodyguard Jan Schäfer must protect Fiona Weibel, a key witness for the International Tribunal of the Law of the Sea. With Weiber having insider knowledge of a Swiss shipping company's illicit activities, a game of cat and mouse over her life begins.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Thailand (2)
programme.desc: With his colleague’s life on the line, Inspector Mehmet has to bust Thai crime boss Worawit out of jail. But an ambush by the Red Dragon gang leaves Worawit kidnapped and Mehmet injured and semi-conscious. How will Mehmet save his colleague now?

programme.title: Deal At The Border
programme.desc: Aza and Samat, two drug runners navigating the secret routes in the mountains of Central Asia, stumble upon Nazik, a young girl fleeing from slavery. When Nazik is recaptured by a criminal, facing a grim return to captivity, Aza resolves to save her.

programme.title: The Second
programme.desc: An author's success following the release of her celebrated erotic memoir is threatened when her best friend and muse reveals the truth behind the memoir's provenance, igniting an incendiary tale of sex, lies and betrayal.

programme.title: Veins Of The World
programme.desc: After his father dies in a tragic car accident, 11-year-old Amra sets out to continue his father’s vision of the traditional nomad way of life and to continue his fight against global mining companies who threaten to destroy it.

programme.title: Broken Reflections
programme.desc: Tushar, a 17-year-old boy, discovers his mother's extramarital affair on a school bunk which throws him into emotional and psychological turmoil.

programme.title: From The Vine
programme.desc: A burnt-out executive experiences an ethical crisis and travels back to his hometown in rural Italy to recalibrate his moral compass.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 5: Let It Go
programme.desc: Despite political pressure to close the case and managing to avoid fingerprint detection, Shelly is put in a precarious position when descriptions from new witnesses threaten to implicate her.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 6: Silent Mouth
programme.desc: The pressure builds on all fronts as Jason tries to close the case. Will Shelly be able survive as the pressure builds? The one option closed to her is to flee - she would never leave her children.
